data.text: @nickdalton15 Hello, Nick! Our team is doing their best to process all incoming requests as fast as possible, however as you may be aware, currently we are receiving tens of thousands of them, so unfortunately it will take longer time than usual for us to get back to you.

@Dana_Jankovska Hello, Dana. If it's possible, you may travel with one of the repatriation flights: 
https://t.co/i0L9jocUU6 .

Mums bija gods veikt jau otro lidojumu no Urumči starptautiskās lidostas, ar @Airbus A220-300 lidmašīnu atvedot @VMNVD vēl vienu īpašu un ļoti gaidītu kravu ar aptuveni vienu miljonu sejas masku un respiratoru. Kopumā atvedām 621 kasti, kravai sverot aptuveni 5,4 tonnas. https://t.co/qYWEwE8w9z

We had an honor to perform the second special cargo flight to and from Ürümqi Diwopu International Airport in China, bringing around one million face masks and respirators made in Zhejiang and Jiangsu regions intended for the National Health Service of the Republic of Latvia. https://t.co/UCFYyRDYgl

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

data.text: @uberzins Labdien! Šonakt ielidoja otrais īpašais kravas lidojums no Urumči starptautiskās lidostas Ķīnā, kas uz Latviju atgādāja aptuveni vienu miljonu sejas masku.
@jilldickieson We understand, Jill. May we kindly ask you to send us your reservation number privately? We will check!

@ErnestasKardzys Hi! As you might be aware, currently we are receiving tens of thousands of requests from our customers, therefore processing them can take some time. Once processed payment will be sent within 90 days. We thank for your patience and understanding.

@jilldickieson Hi! As you might be aware, currently we are receiving tens of thousands of requests from our customers, therefore processing them can take some time. Once processed payment will be sent within 90 days. We thank for your patience and understanding.
@annie_hotaru Labdien! Tā kā saņemam ļoti daudz pieteikumu, to izskatīšana ir ilgāka nekā ierasts. Kad pieteikums būs izskatīts, kolēģi no Rezervāciju departamenta sazināsies ar Jūsu vecākiem.
@GarosaLelde Labdien! Lūdzam skatīt DM ziņas.
@StuartH65636531 You will get full refund (if we have cancelled the flights).
@Trevski220 Currently not, however we will inform if there will be additions.

@alexeyre73 Hi! As you might be aware, currently we are receiving tens of thousands of requests from our customers, therefore processing them can take some time. Once processed payment will be sent within 90 days. We thank for your patience and understanding.
@StuartH65636531 Please check the section "My Booking" for all the available options and details.
@StuartH65636531 Hello! It is valid till May 31st 2021, and also for the flights till May 31st 2021.

@georgiawetheral Hi! As you might be aware, currently we are receiving tens of thousands of requests from our customers, therefore processing them can take some time. Once processed payment will be sent within 90 days. We thank for your patience and understanding.

@isankadesta Hi! As you might be aware, currently we are receiving tens of thousands of requests from our customers, therefore processing them can take some time. Once processed payment will be sent within 90 days. We thank for your patience and understanding.
@HenrietaVerho Labdien! Šobrīd saņemam desmitiem tūkstošu šādu pieprasījumu, tāpēc to apstrāde var aizņemt daudz ilgāku laiku kā ierasts. Liels paldies par sapratni un pacietību.
@zimnii_kyst It may take up to 90 days for the transfer due to high workload. Thank you.

@AndreHa49706410 Hi! As you might be aware, currently we are receiving tens of thousands of requests from our customers, therefore processing them can take some time. We thank for your patience and understanding.

@zimnii_kyst Hello! Please be informed that the "link" is sent only in the cases when passenger is using the online payment form in order to, add extra services to the reservation, for example.
Therefore all you need to do is wait at the moment for the refund to appear in your account. Thanks
@MaraKlava Labdien! Nē, tas nav jādara vēlreiz, ja naudas atmaksu jau esiet pieprasījusi.
@Trevski220 Here they are: https://t.co/BEnLmQ6VoW

airBaltic izpildīs papildu lidojumus no Amsterdamas un Frankfurtes uz Rīgu un atpakaļ. Lidojumi uz un no Rīgas notiks 15. aprīlī, 22. aprīlī, 29. aprīlī un 6. maijā. Rezervēt biļetes iespējams, zvanot uz īpašu tālruni: https://t.co/HekDhm5fGC https://t.co/PAwesDXIJz

airBaltic has scheduled additional flights from Amsterdam and Frankfurt to Riga and vice versa. Flights to and from Riga will be performed on April 15, April 22, April 29 and May 6. It is possible to book tickets for these flights via special phone line: https://t.co/xY2EkARtIQ https://t.co/ywJ0Vw002G
@abdsofika Hello! May we ask you to DM us more details as exactly in which e-mails you are being asked to do it once more? Thanks.
@AuvesCBl0uIjYgD Hello! Currently such route is not being planned however it might be in the future? Follow our social media channels for such announcements in the future.
@AivarsTennisUK Our team is working on this. Thank you and stay safe!

@AivarsTennisUK Hi! Government of the Republic of Latvia has extended the state of emergency in Latvia and kept the ban of international air traffic valid till May 12 in order to limit the spread of Coronavirus. 
All airBaltic connections are temporarily suspended till May 12, 2020 inclusive.

@JackDavis123456 You are welcome, stay safe!

data.text: @JackDavis123456 Hi! As you might be aware, currently we are receiving tens of thousands of requests from our customers, therefore processing them can take some time. We thank for your patience and understanding.
@StephenPrimp Good morning! Please DM us your booking reference number privately, we will check.

@Trevski220 Good morning! Yes, there might be additional repatriation flights. Please follow our social media channels as well as homepage for the latest:
https://t.co/i0L9jocUU6
@SolvitaSvika Labvakar! Ja esiet pieprasījusi naudas atmaksu uz bankas kontu, tā tiks apstrādāta un nosūtīta 90 dienu laikā. Paldies par pacietību un sapratni.
Soon our green tails will be back in the skies! 📸 by Roberts Epners https://t.co/tSobZQpbgR
@JB_862 @HelenTodd3 Hello! It may take up to 90 days once processed.

@DFCLee90 Hello! Thanks for your message. If you have applied for a refund, please know it's in the queue for processing. Our team is doing their best to process it as fast as possible, however please note this process will take longer time than usual.
@HelenTodd3 Stay safe!
@HelenTodd3 Hello! Please be informed that there is no need for such details as payment will be sent back to the same account/bank card which was used for the ticket purchase. Thank you.

data.text: "Our company has done and will do an excellent job for Latvia and the Baltics. Together we will do our utmost to get our green tails back into the skies as fast as we can. We will be back even stronger than before." Read the message from our CEO, @Gaussm https://t.co/PNzPJvyBqm https://t.co/0KXpzftgBA

@VMejers Hello! If you indeed requested refund via the online form, we kindly invite you to check with Reservations department, our colleagues will advise:
https://t.co/UWa844vRzD

data.text:
@S_c_len Hello! Please be informed that the "link" is sent only in the cases when passenger is using the online payment form in order to, add extra services to the reservation, for example.
Therefore all you need to do is wait at the moment for the refund to appear in your account. Thanks

@ervinsk Labdien! Jūsu pieprasījums šobrīd ir apstrādes gaidīšanas rindā. Visdrīzāk naudas atmaksa notiks periodā līdz 12 nedēļām. Vai varam lūgt precizēt, kāda kļūda pieļauta? Varat sazināties arī privāti. Paldies.
@Janis34966995 Labdien! Paldies par ziņu. Šobrīd tos reisus neplānojam atcelt - tie notiks kā plānots. Gadījumā, ja ar reisu notiks kādas izmaiņas, pasažieri tiks apzināti individuāli e-pastā.

data.text: @rourkeyb Good evening! Yes, you may cancel the whole booking in such case.

@Halco46 Hello! Thanks for your message. If you have applied for a refund, please know it's in the queue for processing. Our team is doing their best to process it as fast as possible, however please note this process will take longer time than usual.
@mcdamman Hello, Marie. If your booking was made on https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg, please check section "My Booking" for all the available options, including full refund.

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text: @n_ropert Hello! Please DM us privately your booking reference number, we will check.

@S_c_len This was a system e-mail sent to all the database with cancelled flights.
You may check section "My Booking" for all the available options, also the form there, which, as we understood from your first tweet, you have already submitted for the refund. Thank you.

@S_c_len Hello! Thanks for your message. If you have already applied for a refund, please know it's in the queue for processing. Our team is doing their best to process it as fast as possible, however please note this process will take longer time than usual.
@Metatron__One There should be no issues in this case.

@Metatron__One Hello! Thanks for your message. If you have already applied for a refund, please know it's in the queue for processing. Our team is doing their best to process it as fast as possible, however please note this process will take longer time than usual.

@CUFC_Bonn Hello! Our team is doing everything in their power. Due to tens of thousands of such requests, it may take much longer time than usual for processing them. Once done, refund will be sent within 90 days. Thanks for the patience and understanding.

@breannawanders Thank you. In that case your request is waiting for the processing. Due to tens of thousands of such requests, it may take much longer time than usual. Once done, refund will be sent within 90 days.
@breannawanders Hello! If the flights were purchased on our webpage, for all the available flight options (including refund) we kindly invite you to check section "My Booking".
@DimonVavilov71 Hello! If your flight has been cancelled and you will request the full refund, once processed by our colleagues, it will be sent within 90 days. Thank you.
@DrTommyT25 Hello! Yes, please DM us more details, we will check.

@JurisSleiers @annalapina_ Labdien! Vai varam lūgt DM ziņā atsūtīt sīkākas detaļas - Jūsu rezervācijas numuru, kā arī ekrānšāviņu ar konkrēto e-pastu, ko saņēmāt? Pieļaujam, ka sistēma to izsūtījusi automātiski, jo naudas atgriešanas pieprasījumi dalītajam maksājumam tiek apstrādāti manuāli. Paldies.
@Jaspincairn1 @lcferns Hello! Thanks for your message. Please know your request is in the queue for processing. Your request will be processed within the following weeks. Thank you!

@Domcas7 Hi! Thanks for your interest. We are actively following the recommendations and decisions made by our health authorities and government. Currently our connections are temporarily suspended until April 14. The latest travel updates can be found here: https://t.co/i0L9jnVk2y

urls.title: Travel & health documents | Visas | airBaltic
urls.description: Valuable information on health and travel documents such as visas for airBaltic passengers. Find out what you need to know before your flight!

data.text: @chelsea57783937 Hello! Thanks for your message. Please know your request is in queue for processing. Currently our Customer service teams are doing their utmost to answer all passenger requests. We regret to inform it will take longer time to process your request. Thanks for your patience!
@CYMROPORT Hello Tommie! Thanks for your message. We kindly advise to contact the agency that created your tickets for more details. Thank you!

@mayforcebe Labvakar! Ja pieteicāties kompensācijai, iesniegums patlaban gaida rindā uz apstrādi. Mūsu komanda dara visu iespējamo, lai pieprasījumus apstrādātu pēc iespējas ātrāk, taču šobrīd tas var aizņemt ilgāku laiku nekā ierasts. Paldies par sapratni un atvainojamies par neērtībām.

@lcferns Hello Laura! Thanks for your message. In case of a cancelled flight you are eligible to receive a refund. Please see the screenshot attached and visit Manage My Booking for more details. https://t.co/RSC8fKtdbc
@nymxen Hello! Thanks for your message. We'll contact the passengers from affected flights individually via email.

Turpinoties koronavīrusa krīzei, airBaltic ir spiesta laika periodā no 2020. gada 15. aprīļa līdz 31. oktobrim papildus samazināt darbības apjomus, atceļot aptuveni 50% plānoto lidojumu. Jaunākā ceļojumu informācija pieejama šeit: https://t.co/ILyQrRSH1M https://t.co/V22i1ocdZ8

Due to Coronavirus crisis airBaltic is forced to further decrease its overall capacity between April 15 and October 31, 2020, cancelling approximately 50% of its flights. Read the latest information concerning future travels here: https://t.co/wpI8sl7nXn https://t.co/mxodoxDeKr

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world

data.text: @ingusitoo Labdien! Paldies par ziņu. Ik dienu rūpīgi sekojam atbildīgo iestāžu sniegtajām rekomendācijām un izsludinātajiem drošības pasākumiem. Aicinām sekot aktuālajai informācijai mūsu jaunumu lapā: https://t.co/BVDPjewf6d
@RumaKlab Rezervācijas numurs nav tas pats, kas lidojuma numurs (piemēram BT101). Aicinām arī pārbaudīt, vai izmantojiet pareizo formu: https://t.co/LyxztE63nS
@filcis Sveiks, Mārtiņ! Paldies par ziņu. Lūdzu, atsūtiet vairāk informācijas par savu rezervāciju mums privāti - pārbaudīsim.

@ilz Labdien, Ilze! Pateicamies par ziņu. Ja esat kompensācijai pieteikusies, tā ir apstrādes procesā. Mūsu komanda dara visu, lai pieprasījumus apstrādātu pēc iespējas ātrāk. Šobrīd nevarēsim pateikt precīzu laiku, kad tiks veikta naudas atmaksa, taču tas notiks tuvāko mēnešu laikā.
@RumaKlab Lūdzam skatīt visu informāciju, tajā skaitā arī rakstītu sarkaniem burtiem. https://t.co/D9kDDQRHXB
@_gerhards_ Jūsu ziņas esam saņēmuši un gaidām atbildi no tehniskās komandas. Paldies par pacietību!

@RumaKlab Labdien! Ja biļete iegādāta mūsu mājaslapā, aicinām skatīt mājaslapas sadaļu "Mana Rezervācija", kurā atradīsiet visu nepieciešamo informāciju (arī kā pieprasīt citas alternatīvas dāvanu kartei).

@Kristaps_judins Labrīt! Reisu atcelšanas un maiņas dēļ, šobrīd tiešām saņemam daudz zvanus, taču, pasažieri tiek apkalpoti nemitīgi. Aicinām mēģināt vēlreiz nedaudz vēlāk. Pateicamies par Jūsu pacietību.

@katsolomanjuk Good morning! Please be informed that due to high workload it may take up to 90 days for the refund. Gift voucher (once requested and processed) should be sent within few days. If still not there, please call us: https://t.co/UWa844vRzD

urls.title: Frequently asked question about airBaltic
urls.description: We're here to help you! Helpful answers to your questions and useful contacts to find out everything you need about your flight.

data.text: @hup333 Good morning! Please send us privately in DM message more details about your reservation, we will check.

@DFCLee90 Hi! Unfortunately we won't be able to comment about 48 hours (as standard time is 72 hours, however not in this extraordinary situation). Due to high amount of incoming requests it may take some time for our colleagues to process it. Once done, refund will be sent within 90 days.
@_gerhards_ Labrīt! Lūdzam skatīt privātās ziņas.

@Lavrra Kā jau minēts formā, EUR 20 bonuss tiek piešķirts tikai pilnībā apmaksātām rezervācijām. Ja reisu atcēlām un Jums bija dalītais maksājums un no tā apmaksāta tikai daļa, atgriezta tiks šī daļa.

@zhanett @Kukarane Labvakar! Šobrīd saņemam desmitiem tūkstošu šādu pieprasījumu, tāpēc lielās darba noslodzes dēļ pilna naudas atmaksa var prasīt līdz pat 90 dienām. Paldies par pacietību un sapratni.

@Kukarane Labvakar! E-pastā nosūtītajā saitē (ievadot savu rezervācijas numuru un uzvārdu) pasažieris var izvēlēties starp dāvanu karti, vai pilnu atmaksu. Tāpat iespējams arī lūgt lidojumu datumu maiņu.

data.text: @_elmundoespera Good evening! Please check your DMs!

@Do_Keiner Hello, Dominik. Currently all flights are stopped till April 14th and as of this moment we cannot tell you for 100%, when exactly flights after this period will be restarted, as situation changes every day. Please check this page for the latest: https://t.co/i0L9jnVk2y

urls.title: Travel & health documents | Visas | airBaltic
urls.description: Valuable information on health and travel documents such as visas for airBaltic passengers. Find out what you need to know before your flight!

data.text: @aaa4fly Hello! It looks to us that you have requested gift voucher instead of the full refund, therefore you were issued a gift voucher with added bonus. For more details we kindly invite you to contact our Reservations department: https://t.co/UWa844egb3
@mariedzp You are welcome! Stay safe!

@mariedzp Hello! Please be informed that due to high workload it may take up to 90 days for the refund to appear in your account (once processed by our team). We thank for your patience in this extraordinary situation.
@janisz Labvakar! Jā, visi e-pasti tiek izsūtīti “viļņos”, tāpēc, iespējams Jums tas vēl nav ticis nosūtīts. Varam aicināt DM ziņā atsūtīt savu rezervācijas numuru, paskatīsimies!

@Linda__Kalnina Labdien! Vai DM ziņā varam atsūtīt savu rezervācijas numuru, vai, ja tādu neziniet, sīkākas detaļas par rezervāciju (lidojuma maršruts, pasažieru vārdi, datumi)? Skatīsimies, kā varam palīdzēt.
@Janis34966995 Labrīt! Šobrīd jaunus mājās atgriešanās lidojumus neplānojam, taču aicinām sekot līdzi mūsu mediju kanāliem, kā arī mājaslapai, kurā informēsim par jaunumiem: https://t.co/BVDPjewf6d

@AKuznetsovLv Hello! As you might be aware currently we are receiving tens of thousands of such requests therefore processing them can take much longer time for our colleagues as usual (72 hours). If you requested full refund to your account, once processed you will receive it within 12 weeks.

@spuriousbeige Hello, Trish. As also mentioned in the "My Booking" section, you may also request full refund via the online form - there is also a link. If your reservation was purchased via the travel agency, you will need to contact it for more details. Thank you.

No 20. marta esam palīdzējuši atgriezties 2 262 iedzīvotājiem Baltijā, kā arī esam pārvadājuši 509 pasažierus no Rīgas, ļaujot tiem nokļūt savās mājās. Mēs lepojamies ar savu komandu, kas pašaizliedzīgi veikusi savus pienākumus, īstenojot īpašos lidojumus. https://t.co/iXO13nEv3N

@infotexture Hello! We can advise you to get in touch with our Reservations department in this case, they will advise:
https://t.co/UWa844vRzD

urls.title: Frequently asked question about airBaltic
urls.description: We're here to help you! Helpful answers to your questions and useful contacts to find out everything you need about your flight.

data.text:
@deenchix_ Labdien! Joprojām turpinām saņemt lielu apjomu ar pieprasījumiem no mūsu pasažieriem, kā rezultātā atbildes laiks var būt daudz ilgāks (līdz pat vairākām nedēļām). Ja nepieciešama tūlītēja informācija, varam aicināt mums zvanīt: https://t.co/CHGjV15S1F
Paldies par sapratni.

urls.title: Visbiežāk uzdotie jautājumi - sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Meklē atbildes uz interesējošiem jautājumiem un atrodi noderīgus kontaktus, lai varētu ar mums sazināties neskaidrību gadījumā. Mēs ar prieku palīdzēsim!

data.text: We are delighted for the opportunity to carry to Latvia almost one million face masks and respirators for our medical staff. We performed the 4815 km flight from Ürümqi Diwopu International Airport in China in 6 hours and 35 minutes with our @Airbus A220-300 registered as YL-CSI. https://t.co/xEIMRCyj3H
